website_summaries.verdict: The Harman Kardon SB 16 features a premium price tag and some remote control quirks, but its excellent sound quality and exterior design make it worth the extra cash.
pros: The Harman Kardon SB 16 has excellent sound quality for a sound bar
Its exterior design is also a cut above budget sound bars, and its two digital audio inputs should be enough for basic home theaters
cons: The subwoofer's giant footprint may be too much for some buyers
The SB 16 also relies on your TV's remote to adjust volume, which may result in annoying onscreen messages on some HDTVs
And $600 for a sound bar is more than many are willing to spend

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for music
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned three other soundbars before I got this one. Great sound for music, great base for those movies. The price is outstanding. This model does not have the HDMI pass through, the other model has it if you need it, but all my TVs have an optical output which works great with this soundbar. It took 3 minutes to control it with my Directv remote so it would control the sound and mute. I now have two of these for my two TVs.
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker bar and will be ordering another one with bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: rjames

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: This system produces really good sound in a relatively compact package. I say relatively because, in fact, the subwoofer is huge. The sound bar, however, is very compact and the whole system produces very good sound. It is not on par with a full 5.1 surround sound system but you will get fairly close. Setup was easy - just make sure that you select the proper audio input format (analog or digital) This is a vast improvement over the built-in speakers on my LED TV
customer_reviews.author: fourover

customer_reviews.title: Easy Hook Up and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received this is a timly fashion, very happy with the packaging and the quality of the unit. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: so I knew they would sound great.
customer_reviews.text: I already had one, so I knew they would sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best
customer_reviews.text: Best sound bar for a TV I ever heard. Very bassy and sound quality is what you expect from HK
customer_reviews.author: Ricka254

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was not as I would expect it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was not as I would expect it to be sub woofer does not power on with sound bar sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harmon Kardon Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Good Soundbar. You will have problems if you have Direct TV. You will need to use the TV remote. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: keeps turning off
customer_reviews.text: great sound but unit turns off on its own and will not turn back on. try it again in an hour its fine, for a bit. contacted Harman online for new unit its under warranty will update when Harman responds update: customer service is awful I was told new product would be shipped in 4 days, two weeks later still did not ship, I was told it was out of stock after being put on hold for 30min. funny part is its still available on manufacture site. as of now they still have my money and my sound bar until it comes in stock- item is now listed as discontinued! wtf bottom line no $ and no sound bar
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Sounding off
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as promised. I have enjoyed great sound for the playoffs and movies are better than ever. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, like of bluetooth and HDMI connection, discontinued model.
customer_reviews.author: JD8989

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding system
customer_reviews.text: Works greats sounds awesome. Fills the room with sound. Added a second wireless sub for more bass. Love the wireless technology.
customer_reviews.author: Audiodude

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent sound!!! easy to install. tricky remote contron configuration (this is the only bad thing) beautiul design, it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Salinas Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon SB16 Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my bedroom where it is connected to a Sony 40 inch LED HDTV. Sound is piped by optical (Toslink) cable. It works flawlessly the only issue I have, well, I have two: cannot train the TV remote to operate the Soundbar and when I turn the TV on I have to turn the Soundbar on manually. I am sure it is my fault not being technically minded. Recommended to those who seek good but discrete sound in a confined space. It works even better for the geeks.
customer_reviews.author: Goran Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Sombart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar sounds good all the reviews were right on this and goes great with my TV
customer_reviews.author: john smith

customer_reviews.title: fabulous for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day and it is awesome. We use our Tivo remote control to simultaneously turn this on and off with our TV. If you are cramped for space around your TV but want better speakers this is the deal right here. The quality and ease of setup is great. We had tried 2 other sound bars made by a different company and both of them broke in the first couple of months. This one has been rock solid for nearly 1 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Good system. You've got to have theater sound with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good system. You've got to have theater sound with a big screen TV. I am pleased with the quality of sound, but due to the acoustic layout of my living room, it doesn't seem to give optimum output. I was expecting a lot more. I am enjoying it during movies and football games. DVD videos seem to work best, now I have to invest in a Blue Ray player it seems to enjoy full experience of what the system is capable of.
customer_reviews.author: Batman54

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for both music and tv/movies. It is a VAST improvement over stock speakers. Shakes the entire house if you want it too. Granted our house is only about 1000 square feet. Very,very happy with purchase. I love great sound but don't want a bunch of speakers to achieve that. This accomplishes that in spades
customer_reviews.author: jpf

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar was too large to place in front of my plasma, which is on a stand. Therefore I mounted it on the wall above it. Sound quality and depth is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Master Piece
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. In addition to crisp highs and mids, the well controlled thumping base creates wonders. Excellent overall performance. Have listened to Bose sound bar and Yamaha high end ones. If you like the real sound without mess of wires, HK SB16 is the perfect solution. Bose excels in terms of surround sound but HK's base has no competition. Overall happy with this master piece.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Magan

customer_reviews.title: Sound Bar Review
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to control volume with the remote. You need to be close. For the price it doesnt sound much different than other sound bars
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm S Dobrow

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Awesome Bass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Bose 1SR for my bedroom...and wanted something not as expensive for my family room since I am not in there as much. I just purchased a 60" LED TV, so wanted something to compliment that. After researching different options, I went with the Harman Kardon. AWESOME choice!! Absolutely love everything about it. The bass is unbelievable. Great choice! You can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny65

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar for TV
customer_reviews.text: It is of high quality as far as the sound, and It looks good also. The quality of the equipment is top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Willeford

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound quality but there's no remote control, no mute button and that's annoying it only mutes when you lower the volume to the end, and finally the lowest level you can get it down to before muting level is equivalent to this statement: "everyone in the house can still hear it".. It really stays quite high. I thought I could live with that but it's really noticeable in the evening time when others go to bed and you're still watching tv, family members from the upstairs rooms can hear it clearly. Pros: great sound quality. Cons: no mute button, no remote control and it stays very high when lowering the volume to the lowest level before mute.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Ferzli

customer_reviews.title: A bit frustrated
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. I'm frustrated that I can't make the optical link from the TV work, and that I can't program the SRC key from my remote. Any hints?
customer_reviews.author: ROLAND A DESZOEKE

customer_reviews.title: $600 Letdown
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar has been in my house for about 2 years now, and I can safely say I hate it. The volume up button has started to collapse in on itself, random wake-ups if not properly shutdown can cause screaming roommates when turning on the tv at 4am, the remote control sensor is basically useless at long distances, there is no volume level indicator. The only positive thing that this speaker has going for it is that it's loud and sounds great, but it's lack of usability completely negates any +1's gained for sound. I seriously don't understand how this thing costed $600. Step up your game Harmon Kardon.
customer_reviews.author: unsterblich6

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: First, as many reviewers have stated, the sound this thing produces is fantastic. However, be aware that the subwoofer is pretty big and even the sound bar is no small piece of real estate. We have a pretty small living room and the soundbar just didn't fit on the table where our TV sits--and placing it on the floor wouldn't work. But the biggest problem was we couldn't turn the volume down very low without being able to adjust the output of our TV (Samsung LED). We're going to try it at our son's beach house and see if it works better there.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unit for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my home. I have a Sharp Aquos 60" LED. Many reviews on this sound bar complain about not having a volume indicator or a separate remote control. I found there is not reason to have either. I plugged my unit in, programmed my uverse remote for volume of sound bar and turned off speakers of tv. Even when tv speakers are off, i still have a volume level indicator on screen of tv. Now when i press the volume up or down, the SB16 volume increases or decreases and the indicator on tv moves accordingly also. Works perfect and the sound is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W Churchwell

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Sound
customer_reviews.text: I had to add some volume to my 60" Sharp Aquos LED TV. I tried to go cheaper with an entry level soundbar but the sound just wasn't good. I bought the SB 16 and could not be happier. I adjust the sub based on what I'm watching. A super hero movie gets lots of base while a TV show is adjusted for little. The sound is so rich and loud. You should hear an Alice Cooper concert..... Add a few extra bucks and buy this soundbar. It is well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Draper

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist solution if set up properly!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy from Amazon but just wanted to say wow..........this thing is so simple to set up and sync with optical tv connection. Everyone has bagged it for no remote, no display, no HDMI. That to me is irrelevant if all my inputs are HDMI into Tv and optical out to sound bar. This unit is about great sound, sleek appearance and an absolute minimalist approach. I got it for AUD $376 ex-display and couldnt be happier! Remember another remote us a hassle and you can only listen to one thing at a time. Bass/ Subby is like clear Thunder and looks great aswell!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: The only reason why I didn't give it a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I didn't give it a 5 is because I'm still trying to figure out if I can play the music from my IPhone on it via Bluetooth. Does anyone know this?
customer_reviews.author: Jade Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound but Wi-Fi Interference
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just awesome and the system is easy to set up. But as other users have pointed out, the wireless subwoofer interferes with at least 2.4 GH based Wi-Fi networks. The sound is interrupted with using internet on the Wi-Fi; and the Wi-Fi becomes erratic. I have not tried it with 5.4 GHz W-Fi network. But if your house or apartment is small and within the range of 5.4 GHz network then this speaker system may work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: SanjeevP

customer_reviews.title: What's Not To Like
customer_reviews.text: Near audiophile sound quality at an affordable price point. Easy set-up with no connection issues. Enjoying it thoroughly. Still expensive at the big box retailers so grab it off Amazon definitely!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar provides excellent sound. The 10 inch subwoofer offers stomach curling base, the sound bar provides exceptional clarity, and everything ties together so perfect. The build quality of the product is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: SB16 does not work with LG 47LX6500 3D smart TV
customer_reviews.text: I got a new SB 16 and connet it wito LG 47LX6500 smart TV thorugh optical cable but It does not work, no sound caming out. The TV specification indicates the audio is dolby digital decorder. I called and email Kardon Harmon support but never heard from them. Is there any one has such a experience on how to deal with it? It really makes me disapointed. Thannks.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound from the SB-16 is excellent but it does have a flaw. There is a continual faint but annoying hum from the subwoofer which is readily apparent whenever the source is quiet. The average user may not be too bothered by this, but anyone with a good ear certainly will be. Harmon Kardon "support" in USA is of no help at all and referred me to the Australian agent for Harmon Kardon who ignored every attempt to contact them. Avoid this product and these agents. The hum problem appears to be inherent in the SB-16 and it is not recommended. I have given the SB-16 away and replaced it with the Bose 1-SR which is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Warwick.F

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! The only reason I'm giving it 4 vs. 5 stars is the lack of remote and blue tooth, otherwise, VERY happy!
customer_reviews.author: good food fan

customer_reviews.title: No Tech Support!
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble getting the system to produce a Digital sound. Directions in Owners Manual very VAGUE, Tech Support is WORTHLESS, Can't get thru on the phone ( keep getting disconnected ) Tech Dept doesn't respond to E-Mails. I E-Mailed the Corporate offices, NO REPLY!! I don't think they care much about there customers. The system does produce a good quality sound, but I question the value of it when you take into consideration that you are paying a higher price for the name and all that supposedly goes with it, IE: Tech Support.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon sound bar 16
customer_reviews.text: Best birthday gift ever. My flat screen had really weak sound. Solution... Harman Kardon's sound bar. This thing really packs a punch! Thanks mom!
customer_reviews.author: joclomba

customer_reviews.title: Subwoffer makes clicking noise
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent however the subwoffer makes this clicking noise like it checking a frequency. I researched the internet but could not find any info. please help because it is extremely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: psapovad1

customer_reviews.title: Expensive paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last Christmas at Fry's for $199. It was difficult to set up with Samsung 55" HDTV. Tried everything. Researched, called customer support. Ended up going back to a set of Bose computer speakers that plugin through the headphone jack. Maybe i can pull the magnets out of the harmon speakers. otherwise its just an expensive paper weight. My advice is research before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: bjohn

customer_reviews.title: Expensive JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: This is Chinese built junk at its worst! Trust me on this buy any other brand than this, the electronics inside are not worth 25 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: B. Graver

product_meta.title: Harman Kardon SB16 Soundbar and Wireless 100 Watt Subwoofer (Black)
product_meta.description:
Home theatre installations typically involve five loudspeakers, a subwoofer or two, and lots and lots of speaker wire. Not every room can accommodate all that stuff, and not every homeowner wants to live with it. The harman kardon home cinema soundbar system offers an elegant and far simpler alternative: a single amplified loudspeaker unit connected directly to your television, DVD player or game console, and a single wireless subwoofer that you may place anywhere in the room. Offering traditional stereo playback or realistic 3 D surround sound processing, the SB 16 delivers true harman kardon performance with the absolute minimum number of components, and with no wires in (or out of) sight.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


TURN YOUR FLAT-PANEL TV INTO A HOME THEATER.
Home theater installations typically involve five loudspeakers, a subwoofer or two, and lots of speaker wire. Not every room can accommodate all that stuff - and not every homeowner wants to live with it. The harman kardon® home cinema soundbar system offers an elegant and far simpler alternative: a single amplified loudspeaker unit that connects directly to your TV, DVD player or game console, and a single wireless subwoofer that can pump bass from anywhere in the room. Whether you need traditional stereo playback or realistic 3-D surround-sound processing, the SB 16 simplifies your life, delivering true harman kardon performance with an absolute minimum number of components and wires leading into (or out of) the system.

THE HARMAN KARDON® SB 16 - AT A GLANCE
Stylish, sleek 2.1-channel soundbar speaker Wireless subwoofer 3-D virtual surround processing Optical and coaxial digital input connections Works with your TV remote Magnetically shielded speakers in the soundbar and subwoofer Dual-position EQ switch Soundbar trim switch Music sense switching Wall-mounting hardware for soundbar Energy-saving features 

AN AMAZING SURROUND EXPERIENCE FROM A SINGLE SPEAKER.
The soundbar's 3-D virtual surround processing turns you system into a theater with just a single speaker. IMPRESSIVE 3-D VIRTUAL SURROUND PROCESSING.
Whether you're watching a sitcom or a blockbuster movie, you always want to feel like part of the action developing on screen. That's why the SB 16 produces a complete 3-D virtual surround-sound experience for anyone sitting in front of the soundbar. Bring home a rich, full-bodied theatrical experience without having to add a bunch of extra speakers - or merely give another level of depth to traditional stereo playback. It's your choice. Just prepare to be impressed. 

The EQ and trim switch allow you to optimize the soundbar's performance for your room and particular installation TAILOR PERFORMANCE TO LOCATION WITH A DUAL-POSITION EQ SWITCH.
To improve your system's performance no matter where you place it, your SB 16's soundbar includes a dual-position EQ switch that adjusts the soundbar's center-loudspeaker bass. If you've mounted your soundbar on a wall, flip the switch to the Wall position for the most natural-sounding bass performance. And if it's on a table, simply set the EQ switch to the Table position to achieve the same benefit.


ACHIEVE PEAK PERFORMANCE WITH A TRIM SWITCH.
Different TVs have different audio signals. That's why a trim switch - such as the one on the SB 16 - allows you to adjust the soundbar center speaker's input sensitivity manually, so it will work with a wide range of TVs possessing different audio-signal output levels. For example, if your TV's audio-signal output is too low, the soundbar center may not play loud enough. In this case, set the trim switch to Position Three, so the soundbar center will play louder. If your TV's audio-signal output is too high, you may hear distortion in the soundbar center at normal listening volumes. In this case, set the trim switch to Position One to reduce distortion and improve overall sound quality.


A wireless subwoofer means extreme flexibility in placement

ENJOY ROOM ROCKING BASS.
A WIRELESS SUBWOOFER YOU CAN PUT ANYWHERE.
With a grand total of zero wires and connections going into the soundbar, the SB 16's wireless subwoofer offers you unprecedented flexibility in terms of placement. With a 10-inch (250mm) magnetically shielded woofer and built-in 100-watt amplifier, the wireless subwoofer delivers an impactful one-two bass punch when combined with the soundbar speaker. And thanks to a down-firing bass-reflex enclosure, you can also expect more realistic bass performance and higher bass output, since the subwoofer loads against the floor instead of against surrounding walls. 

TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR SUBWOOFER.
No matter where you put your SB 16 wireless subwoofer, you'll benefit from many advanced features that make the listening experience ideal. 

One such feature is volume control, which lets you adjust the subwoofer's sound levels to accommodate all types of entertainment. 

Second, there's a phase-control switch that lets you optimize subwoofer performance depending on the placement of speakers in the room. For instance, if the subwoofer plays out of phase with the soundbar center speaker, the soundbar and subwoofer could produce sound waves that cancel each other out - or reduce bass performance or even sonic impact. But if you use the phase switch, you'll avoid this problem, put the subwoofer properly in phase with the soundbar speakers and generate a clearer result and more lifelike sounds for instruments such as drums, the piano and strings. 

Finally, the SB 16 soundbar system features a crossover adjustment, which helps your system effect smooth transitions for bass frequencies between the subwoofer and soundbar. The higher you set the crossover setting, the higher in frequency the subwoofer will operate - and the more its bass will overlap that of the soundbar speaker. 


The SB 16 soundbar looks great mounted under a sleek flat-panel TV

INCREDIBLY EASY TO SETUP AND USE.
MOUNT YOUR SOUNDBAR WHEREVER YOU PLEASE.
Designed as an ideal complement to your flat-panel TV, the SB 16 is sleek and easy to install right underneath a mounted plasma or LCD screen - thanks to the wall-mounting hardware that's included with the SB 16 system. Simply install the wall-mount brackets on the wall, attach the soundbar in a few short steps and immediately experience the dramatic, high-definition sound and distinct, clear dialogue that can turn any ordinary sound system into an elite one. And remember: Since the subwoofer is wireless, you don't have to worry about running any wires across the room. 


With multiple digital connections and analog inputs, the SB 16 will connect to all your devices

RECEIVE LOTS OF INPUT (DIGITAL AND ANALOG) FROM MULTIPLE SOURCES.
Since it comes with optical digital, coaxial digital and analog input connections, the SB 16 gives you the flexibility to run several different kinds of systems. Play your TV, DVD or Blu-ray Disc™ player, and satellite or cable tuner with your soundbar - without having to unplug wires every time you change systems. Optical digital and coaxial digital inputs also let you avoid unnecessary electrical connections, so you can experience better sound and image with less signal corrosion over time.

EASY PAIRING WITH YOUR TV REMOTE.
Simplify your life: Direct your entire home theater system with one easy-to-use remote control. The SB 16 soundbar is compatible with, and easily programmed to respond to, your TV remote control's power, volume and input commands. This benefit eliminates yet another remote from that mounting pile on your coffee table. To get the best audio performance out of your SB 16 system, it's recommended that you switch off the sound coming from the TV's loudspeakers. (You can do it by using the audio-setup menu on most current flat-panel TVs.)

ELIMINATE INTERFERENCE WITH MAGNETICALLY SHIELDED SPEAKERS.
Given the eye-catching aesthetics of your SB 16 soundbar speaker, there's a good chance that you'll want to put it on display right next to your flat-panel TV. And you can, thanks to the interference-blocking magnetic shielding - also called video shielding - in the soundbar and subwoofer. With this quality-enforcing feature, you can avoid interruptions to the magnetic field in the TV by placing your soundbar underneath your TV (within 2 feet/60cm). By successfully eliminating interference and distortion, the magnetically shielded soundbar gives you the ultimate freedom to put your soundbar speaker anywhere you please - and the peace of mind to know that you'll always get the best picture and sound quality possible.


The SB 16 soundbar looks great mounted under a sleek flat-panel TV AVOID INTERFERENCE WITH WIRELESS CODE SWITCHES
The last thing you want is an interruption to the picture once you're fully immersed in a film or a TV show. However, if you do experience the rare case of interference, or happen to be operating more than one SB 16 system at a time, you can always change the wireless channel on which the system operates. To do so, simply find one of the four-position wireless code switches on both the soundbar speaker and the subwoofer - and flip the switch to one of the other three positions. Set both components' switches to the same position, and enjoy a continuous entertainment experience with maximum performance - free of distraction. 

CAPITALIZE ON ENERGY-SAVING FEATURES
The SB 16 soundbar speaker and subwoofer system comes equipped with several features that help you save energy. For one, the SB 16 subwoofer comes with an external trigger and auto power on/off that automatically powers the subwoofer up or down in response to relayed voltage or audio signals. What's more, the SB 16 also utilizes low standby power consumption. By meeting the latest green guidelines, the SB 16 intuitively conserves energy while keeping sound quality high - and your power bill - low. 


For more than 50 years, Harman Kardon products have been delivering great sound and extraordinary design

HARMAN KARDON - A LEGACY OF SOUND ACHIEVEMENT
With its sleek look, superb sound and surround-sound simplicity, the SB 16 home theater system is a consummate example of the harman kardon® commitment to excellence. Exemplifying the balance between high style, modern design and audio ingenuity, the SB 16 embodies the true harman kardon spirit - one that's been celebrated by a world of discerning audio enthusiasts for almost 60 years. 

From the world's first stereo receiver (the Festival TA230) to the multimedia masterpiece that became part of the permanent collection at New York City's Museum of Modern Art (SoundSticks II), harman kardon engineers consistently advance the science of sound, developing magnificent audio products that are wholeheartedly dedicated to quality, durability and generating rave reviews from audiophiles.












WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One SB 16 center speaker, One SB 16 subwoofer 



SPEC SHEET
Click here for Spec Sheet
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
Soundbar Includes two way, dual driver left and right soundbar speaker modules, each with two 3" (75mm) midrange drivers and
Wireless, 100 watt, powered subwoofer with a 10" (250mm) driver in a ported enclosure
3 D Virtual Speaker surround mode that creates a complete surround sound experience without any extra speakers or wires
Programmable soundbar that can obey your TV remote?s volume, power and source commands,
A 3/4" (19mm) dome tweeter, video shielded. Enabling a single remote to control your whole home theatre system
Soundbar amplifier power: 25W x 2 into 8 ohms, 20Hz 20kHz, at <0.07 percent THD, with both channels driven simultaneously
